mapper.select: SELECT nno, title, content, category, hit, regdate, moddate, is_deleted FROM (SELECT CEIL(ROWNUM/10) page, nno, title, content, category, hit, regdate, moddate, is_deleted FROM (SELECT nno, title, content, category, hit, regdate, moddate, is_deleted FROM notice WHERE is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY nno desc) ORDER BY nno desc) WHERE page = ${value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE is_deleted = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(nno, title, content, category, hit, regdate, moddate, is_deleted) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NNO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, 'N')
